scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js && sed -i -e 's/javascript_1.default/javascript_1/g' ../StudIO/Editor/CodeMirror/EditorView/libCM.js && sed -i -e 's/const /var /g' ../StudIO/Editor/CodeMirror/EditorView/libCM.js && sed -i -e 's/let /var /g' ../StudIO/Editor/CodeMirror/EditorView/libCM.js && rm ../StudIO/Editor/CodeMirror/EditorView/libCM.js-e
